mapper.insert: insert into t_auth_privilege (id, name, parent_id, sort_no, url,level ) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{parentId},#{sortNo},#{url},#{level} )
mapper.update:
update t_auth_privilege set
name = #{name},
parent_id = #{parentId},
sort_no = #{sortNo},
url = #{url},
level = #{level}
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, parent_id,sort_no, url ,level from t_auth_privilege
select id, name, parent_id,sort_no, url ,level from t_auth_privilege where level=1 order by id
select id, name, parent_id, sort_no, url,level from t_auth_privilege where id=#{id}
SELECT tap.id,tap.name ,tap.url from t_auth_privilege tap where tap.parent_id=#{parentId} order by id
SELECT tap.id,tap.name ,tap.url from t_auth_privilege tap where tap.level=#{level} order by id

select count(id) from t_auth_privilege
AND name LIKE "%"#{name}"%"

select DISTINCT tap.id ,tap.name,tap.url from t_auth_privilege tap where tap.id IN( SELECT DISTINCT tarp.privilege_id from t_auth_role_privilege tarp where tarp.role_id IN (select DISTINCT taur.role_id from t_auth_user_role taur where taur.user_id=#{userId}) ) and tap.level=1
